teaser: The average price of a gallon of regular unleaded gasoline is up to $3.78, according to AAA’s Daily Fuel Gauge Report.

[{"type":"text/html","content":"

The average price of a gallon of regular unleaded gasoline is up again this morning to $3.78, according to AAA’s Daily Fuel Gauge Report. Chris Low, chief economist with FTN Financial, joins Marketplace Morning Report host Jeremy Hobson to explain what's causing the price spike and its impact on buying.

"}]
title: As gas prices rise, consumers take their foot off the pedal
contentencoded: The average price of a gallon of regular unleaded gasoline is up again this morning to $3.78, according to AAA’s Daily Fuel Gauge Report. Chris Low, chief economist with FTN Financial, joins Marketplace Morning Report host Jeremy Hobson to explain what's causing the price spike and its impact on buying.
description: The average price of a gallon of regular unleaded gasoline is up to $3.78, according to AAA’s Daily Fuel Gauge Report.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, February 22, 2013
